author: Pedro

changelog.release_notes:
2.0:

- Weather information (shake to show).
- Maybe, new bugs :\ Please, send me any suggestions or bugs. 

--- Español ---
- Información meteorológica (agita el reloj para mostrar la información).
- Posiblemente, nuevos bugs. Envíame cualquier bug o sugerencia que encuentres.

Fixed config screen. Fixed font kerning.

Corregida la separación de la fuente. Arreglada la pantalla de configuración.

Version 1.5: Works on Original Pebble and Pebble Time. DB 31 speaks Spanish, English, French, Italian, German and Portuguese.
Version 1.6.: New language (Dutch) added; thanks Melle Heeres.
Version 1.5: Works on Original Pebble and Pebble Time. DB 31 speaks Spanish, English, French, Italian, German and Portuguese.
1.3: Now the watchapp updates itself after save preferences.

Version 1.2. Add configuration page. Now you can choose between Spanish and English and change other thinks like date format. 

Please, reload the watchface after changing configuration to refresh all data.
Version 1.0: First versión in english. You can change your language from code just modifying one DEFINE. If you choose english the date format will be month - day.

description:
Color Watchface based on Casio Data Bank 31. All the watchface code (almost everything) is taken from 91 Dub watchface (maybe the best watchface on Pebble Store). So this is my little contribution. 

Now you can choose between Spanish, English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese and Dutch and change other features.

Spanish
Color Watchface based on Casio Data Bank 31. All the watchface code (almost everything) is taken from 91 Dub watchface (maybe the best watchface on Pebble Store). So this is my little contribution. 
Watchface en color basada en el Casio Data Bank 31. Todo el código del watchface (casi todo) está basado en la watchface 91 Dub, posiblemente la mejor watchface de la Pebble Store. Esta es mi pequeña contribución.
title: DB 31
